about_the_game:
Welcome to CoreVr!



The new Social VR experience is for you and your friends.
Experience a collection of worlds made by people like you.
Embrace a welcoming community that is willing to help you find your way.
Uncover worlds that you and your friends can explore.
Feel comfortable with using custom avatars that you and others have made.
Make content with our creation system used in unity and bring your own character to life.
If you don't have a VR headset, don't worry. With desktop mode, you can experience CoreVR without needing a VR headset and still feel connected to others.



Feature set:

Custom avatars, props, and worlds — Create your own immersive experience and allow your friends to join or set it for review to be public. Let anyone join or use your own creations using our Content Creation System; the limits are only your imagination.
Custom safety system: set your game settings to allow specific elements to be shown for your own protection, and feel safe knowing you are protected. You can also block or kick (if you are the instance owner or instance moderator).
Flight, fly around worlds, noclip through walls, find your friends this way, or explore through a new perspective experience (Note: If the world has forbidden flight, then flying is not permitted in that world or experience.)
The easy-to-navigate UI with easy-to-understand icons is good for anyone and can be modified to meet your exact needs.
Easy-to-mod system: we have a built-in system for modding, so you can modify the game easily with our built-in system for modding built right into the game; no need for external tools. (Note: You can use certain tools for modding the game based on the terms of service on our website.)
easy use with VR and desktop functionality with similar capabilities for both platforms, and you can play with VR and non-VR players at the same time.

content:


All content in our game is created by the community itself as a community-driven experience, and anyone is allowed to make content, including you.
All you need to get started making content is the CCS, and you can begin making content for yourself or for anyone. It's super easy to do with Unity.
Everything you make is viewable in the game without needing any extra tools.

content_descriptors.notes: The mature content that can be accessed without the DLC can range based off safety settings and if uploaded content is tagged correctly, any mistagged content is not allowed and will be forcibly changed or removed.

detailed_description:
Welcome to CoreVr!



The new Social VR experience is for you and your friends.
Experience a collection of worlds made by people like you.
Embrace a welcoming community that is willing to help you find your way.
Uncover worlds that you and your friends can explore.
Feel comfortable with using custom avatars that you and others have made.
Make content with our creation system used in unity and bring your own character to life.
If you don't have a VR headset, don't worry. With desktop mode, you can experience CoreVR without needing a VR headset and still feel connected to others.



Feature set:

Custom avatars, props, and worlds — Create your own immersive experience and allow your friends to join or set it for review to be public. Let anyone join or use your own creations using our Content Creation System; the limits are only your imagination.
Custom safety system: set your game settings to allow specific elements to be shown for your own protection, and feel safe knowing you are protected. You can also block or kick (if you are the instance owner or instance moderator).
Flight, fly around worlds, noclip through walls, find your friends this way, or explore through a new perspective experience (Note: If the world has forbidden flight, then flying is not permitted in that world or experience.)
The easy-to-navigate UI with easy-to-understand icons is good for anyone and can be modified to meet your exact needs.
Easy-to-mod system: we have a built-in system for modding, so you can modify the game easily with our built-in system for modding built right into the game; no need for external tools. (Note: You can use certain tools for modding the game based on the terms of service on our website.)
easy use with VR and desktop functionality with similar capabilities for both platforms, and you can play with VR and non-VR players at the same time.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: N/A
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Storage may depend on safety and cached content.

short_description: Welcome to CoreVR, ready to experience something new, something fresh, something to play with friends and make new ones, make content for you, your friends and everyone in CoreVR. Feel free to make content with our unity Core Creation System.
